label.p: If you have 3 machines on Exoscale and you have a sudden traffic spike and the machines transfer 5 GB in one hour but otherwise incur no traffic, for how much data do you have to pay excess bandwidth fees?

choiceresponse.description: Please select all applicable options from the list below. Multiple selections are allowed.

checkboxgroup.choice: None, the usage is within my allowance.

div.p: Ist the allowance sufficent for this scenario? No it isn't. So we have to pay for the difference.
